channel.description: Recent content in side projects on try Code

item.title: My favorite 12 side projects in 2022
item.description: Looking back at 2022, I worked on a whole lot of side projects. I do this mostly for learning purposes, solving problems that I personally have in my own workflow. This year I did a lot of “development live threads”. I’d make coffee in the morning and pull an idea out of my backlog and see how far can I get it by about lunch time. I post screenshots or comments every 10-20 minutes and a lot of people engage on twitter during the time.
